Interface PlanRepository

All Superinterfaces:

      @Query("SELECT p FROM Plan p WHERE p.active = true AND p.amount.amount <= :maxAmount ORDER BY p.amount.amount ASC") List<Plan> findActivePlansUpToAmount(@Param("maxAmount") Long maxAmountCents)
